name: Hood Racer
description:
Rob the neighborhood in record time in this ground breaking, breath taking, new driving game by the game development extraordianir - Tsvetan Gadzhev!

                                                     !Important!

The game was made in the last 2 Hours of the game jam so there is, as expected, a game breaking bug:

- Collecting 1 box ends the game

Anyways...if you are into amazing vechicle controls and want to give it a try, here are the...

                                                         Controls:

Classic WASD

Space to drift

Objective:

Steal all left over Amazon packages from your Hood, while controlling an abismal vechicle. Race for the fastest time, by exploring the map and trying to find glitches in your favour.
